meanings.sent1: The crowd was mafficking after their team won the championship.

meanings.sent3: The children were mafficking joyfully at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The city was mafficking with excitement during the festival.
meanings.sent5: The students mafficking at the school assembly made everyone smile.
